verses.roman:
mātṛ-bhakta-gaṇera prabhu hana śiromaṇi
sannyāsa kariyā sadā sevena jananī

synonyms: mātṛ-bhakta-gaṇera—of the devotees of mothers; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; hana—is; śiromaṇi—the topmost jewel; sannyāsa kariyā—even after taking the sannyāsa order; sadā—always; sevena—renders service; jananī—to His mother.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu is the topmost gem of all devotees of mothers. He rendered service to His mother even after He had accepted the vow of sannyāsa.
